assets.description: Rujira is the app layer on THORChain with a full suite of DeFi applications, accessible with native assets from all connected chains.
assets.name: Rujira

assets.description: AutoRujira maximizes your crypto returns by automating every DeFi opportunity across Rujira and THORChain. From staking to trading, everything runs on autopilot â€” powered by smart contracts and AI
assets.name: AutoRujira

assets.description: Liquidy is a decentralized autonomous organization running a series of profitable on-chain revenue streams. The primary revenue streams are Market Making and a Swap Router.
assets.name: Liquidy

assets.description: Nami provides a suite of DeFi applications including an optimized EARN product and on-chain INDICES for native assets, accessible from any connected chain. Maximize yield. Simplify access. Reduce risk. Grow with Nami
assets.name: Nami Protocol

assets.description: TCY is the token on THORChain to address the default of THORFi. 10% of all system income is paid to TCY stakers.
assets.name: THORChain TCY

assets.description: The Rujira Index (RJI) is a fixed unit asset index that tracks the performance of tokens on the Rujira App Layer. RJI does not auto-rebalance, therefore by design continously overweighting the top performers and underweighting the under-performers.
assets.name: The Rujira Index
